sentences.en: Accordingly, even if the bag eats encase, salary also cannot under minimum wage standard.
sentences.cn: 因此, 即使是包吃包住, 工资也不能低于最低工资标准.

sentences.en: The bag eats encase, is salary OK under minimum wage standard?
sentences.cn: 包吃包住, 工资就可以低于最低工资标准 吗 ?

sentences.en: To is cased ; to is encase.
When nuclear fuel is manufactured it is encased in metal cans.
sentences.cn: 核燃料生产出来时被装在金属罐中。

words.tran_cn: 盖住；包起；装箱（encase的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to cover or surround something completely
to cover or surround something completely
